name: python-uv-sync
postCreateCommand:
bash -lc 'set -e; sudo mkdir -p /home/vscode/.cache /home/vscode/.cache/uv /home/vscode/.cache/pip; sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.cache; if [ -f .devcontainer/p10k/.p10k.zsh ]; then cp -f .devcontainer/p10k/.p10k.zsh /home/vscode/.p10k.zsh; fi; grep -q "source ~/.p10k.zsh" /home/vscode/.zshrc || printf "
# Load Powerlevel10k
[[ -f ~/.p10k.zsh ]] && source ~/.p10k.zsh
" >> /home/vscode/.zshrc; if [ -f pyproject.toml ] || [ -f uv.lock ]; then uv sync --active; fi'
